x-kubernetes-validations.rule: !('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.job) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.job))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.probes) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.probes))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.settings) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.settings))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.target) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.target))
